sourcesContent:
import HomepageHeading from '../HomePageHeading/HomepageHeading';
import getWidth from '../ContainerWidth/GetWidth'
import React, { Component, useState } from 'react'
import { Button, Container, Menu, Responsive, Segment, Visibility, Grid, Divider, Image, Header } from 'semantic-ui-react'
import HeaderPart from '../../../HeaderSegement/HeaderPart';
import got from '../../../Images/got.png';
import ghost from '../../../Images/ghost.png';
import '../../../NewOne/Appp.css';
import vk from '../../../Images/vk.png';
import MovieInfo from '../../../HeaderSegement/Explore/MovieInfo'

const DesktopContainer = ({ children }) => {
  const [fixedMenu, setFixedMenu] = useState(false);


  const FixedMenu = () => {
    setFixedMenu(!fixedMenu)
  }



  return (
    <Responsive getWidth={getWidth} minWidth={Responsive.onlyTablet.minWidth}>

      <Visibility once={false} onBottomPassed={() => FixedMenu()} onBottomPassedReverse={() => FixedMenu()}>
        {/* <Segment inverted vertical textAlign='center' style={{ minHeight: 450 }} className="custom_desktopContainer" > */}
        <Segment vertical padded>
          <Menu
            fixed='true'
            inverted='true'
            secondary={!fixedMenu}
            size='small'
          // className="custom_Menu"
          >
            <Container className="custom_containerMenu">
              <Menu.Item as='a'>Home</Menu.Item>
              <Menu.Item as='a' inverted={!fixedMenu}>Work</Menu.Item>
              <Menu.Item as='a' inverted={!fixedMenu}>Company</Menu.Item>
              <Menu.Item position='right'>
                <Button as='a' inverted={!fixedMenu}>
                  Log in
                   </Button>
              </Menu.Item>
            </Container>
          </Menu>
        </Segment>
      </Visibility>
      <Grid padded>
        <Grid.Row className="customBackgroundColor">
          <Grid.Column width={3} className="headerImageBoxShadow">
            <Segment style={{ minHeight: 420, maxHeight: 420 }}>
              <Menu vertical text >
                <Menu.Item as="a">Reports</Menu.Item>
                <Menu.Item as="a">Analytics</Menu.Item>
                <Menu.Item as="a">Export</Menu.Item>
                <Divider hidden />
                <Menu.Item as="a">Nav item</Menu.Item>
                <Menu.Item as="a">Nav item again</Menu.Item>
                <Menu.Item as="a">One more nav</Menu.Item>
                <Menu.Item as="a">Another nav item</Menu.Item>
                <Menu.Item as="a">More navigation</Menu.Item>
                <Divider hidden />
              </Menu>
            </Segment>
          </Grid.Column>
          <Grid.Column width={13}>
            <Grid>
            <Grid.Row>
              <Grid.Column >
                <Image src={ghost} fluid style={{ minHeight: 370, maxHeight: 370, zIndex :-1 }}/>
              </Grid.Column>
            </Grid.Row>
            </Grid>
            <Grid>
              <Grid.Row>
                <Grid.Column width={13}>
                  <Segment>1</Segment>
                </Grid.Column>
                <Grid.Column width={3}>
                    <MovieInfo url="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3PK2tIyENVA&t=2s" />
                </Grid.Column>
              </Grid.Row>
            </Grid>
            {/* <Segment inverted textAlign='center' style={{ minHeight: 300 }} > */}
            {/* </Segment> */}
          </Grid.Column>
        </Grid.Row>
        <Grid.Row color="blue">
          <Grid.Column width={16}>
            <Header>
              <Image src={vk} fluid />
            </Header>
          </Grid.Column>
        </Grid.Row>
        <Grid.Row color="green">
          <Grid.Column>
            <Segment>
              <Image.Group size="medium">
                <Image src={vk} />
                <Image src={vk} />
                <Image src={vk} />
                <Image src={vk} />
              </Image.Group>
            </Segment>
            <Segment>
              {children}
            </Segment>
          </Grid.Column>
        </Grid.Row>
      </Grid>



    </Responsive >
  )
}

export default DesktopContainer;
